1.overview: Robust and versatile desktop wallet, one of the oldest and most reliable in the Bitcoin ecosystem.

advantages.0: Full control of your private keys

disadvantages.0: User interface not friendly for beginners

2.overview: Multiplatform wallet developed by Blockstream, combines security with ease of use.

disadvantages.1: Fewer advanced features than wallets like Electrum
disadvantages.2: Recovery process different from traditional wallets

3.overview: Desktop wallet focused on privacy and control, with a more modern interface than Electrum.

4.overview: Wallet focused on maximum security with multisignature and advanced hardware wallet support.

advantages.1: Excellent privacy when connected to own node
advantages.2: Clear interface for managing multiple devices

5.overview: Wallet focused on multisignature with one of the most user-friendly interfaces for this purpose.

advantages.2: Excellent combination of security and usability

disadvantages.0: Advanced features may not be obvious for beginners
disadvantages.1: Smaller ecosystem compared to other wallets

6.overview: Mobile version of the popular Electrum wallet, retaining most advanced features.

advantages.0: Same robust security as the desktop version

disadvantages.1: Less user-friendly than other mobile wallets
disadvantages.2: Less frequent updates than the desktop version

7.overview: Mobile extension of Specter Desktop, focused on security and privacy on mobile devices.

disadvantages.0: Limited features compared to the desktop version

8.overview: Beginner-friendly mobile wallet with a good balance of usability and features.

advantages.2: Can connect to your own node
advantages.3: Good for daily use and small amounts

disadvantages.0: Lightning Network relies on third-party servers by default
disadvantages.1: Fewer advanced features than desktop wallets
disadvantages.2: History of some resolved security issues

9.overview: DIY hardware wallet device with 100% open-source code, offering maximum digital sovereignty.

advantages.1: Build your own device, eliminating supply chain risks
advantages.4: Complete control over your hardware and software

disadvantages.2: Fewer UX features compared to commercial hardware wallets

10.overview: Hardware wallet developed by Blockstream with good usability and integration with Green Wallet.

disadvantages.0: Smaller ecosystem compared to established competitors
disadvantages.2: Fewer advanced features than DIY devices like Krux

11.overview: DIY air-gapped device for signing Bitcoin transactions with a focus on maximum privacy.

advantages.1: Can be built with common components

disadvantages.2: Limited interface due to minimalist hardware
